languages.text: "Как странно... Рядом с этой конструкцией моя душа одновременно обнажена и запечатана. Цвета вокруг тают... как и мои силы!"
"How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"
languages.original_text: "Как странно... Рядом с этой конструкцией моя душа одновременно обнажена и запечатана. Цвета вокруг тают... как и мои силы!"

traits.locale_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colors around me melt away... and so do my powers!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colors around me melt away... and so do my powers!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est étrange... À côté de cette structure, mon âme est à la fois nue et engoncée. Les couleurs qui m'entourent s'estompent... et mes pouvoirs aussi ! »
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est étrange... À côté de cette structure, mon âme est à la fois nue et engoncée. Les couleurs qui m'entourent s'estompent... et mes pouvoirs aussi ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这真是太古怪了……站在这件造物旁边，我的灵魂一丝不挂，同时又被层层包裹。我周围的色彩都融化了……我的力量也融化了！”
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: “这真是太古怪了……站在这件造物旁边，我的灵魂一丝不挂，同时又被层层包裹。我周围的色彩都融化了……我的力量也融化了！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「不思議ですね…この建造物のそばにいると、私の魂は裸であると同時に何かに包み込まれているようです。私の周にある色が失われていきます…そして私の力も！」
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: 「不思議ですね…この建造物のそばにいると、私の魂は裸であると同時に何かに包み込まれているようです。私の周にある色が失われていきます…そして私の力も！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie merkwürdig ... Neben diesem Konstrukt ist meine Seele gleichermaßen nackt und eingewickelt. Die Farben um mich schmelzen dahin ... und ebenso meine Kräfte!"
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie merkwürdig ... Neben diesem Konstrukt ist meine Seele gleichermaßen nackt und eingewickelt. Die Farben um mich schmelzen dahin ... und ebenso meine Kräfte!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Qué extraño... Junto a este constructo, mi alma está al mismo tiempo desnuda y embozada. Los colores se funden y disipan a mi alrededor... ¡y con ellos, mis poderes!».
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: «Qué extraño... Junto a este constructo, mi alma está al mismo tiempo desnuda y embozada. Los colores se funden y disipan a mi alrededor... ¡y con ellos, mis poderes!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne kadar da tuhaf. Bu yapının yanında ruhum hem çıplak hem de kundağa sarılmış gibi. Çevremdeki renkler eriyor. Güçlerim de öyle!"
languages.original_text: "How strange... Next to this construct, my soul is both naked and swaddled at the same time. The colours around me melt away... and so do my powers!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da tuhaf. Bu yapının yanında ruhum aynı anda hem çıplak hem de kundağa sarılmış gibi. Çevremdeki renkler eriyor. Güçlerim de öyle!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
